    • isOfTheSameColor

      public boolean isOfTheSameColor(Matrix matrix, int row, int column)
      Parameters:
      matrix - of the player
      row - and column are the top-left corner of the card!
      Returns:
      true, if the card above the one that we placed exists, it's not used for another pattern quest and if it's of the same color of the card that it's placed cornetToCheck can't be null because we pass the coordinate of the top left corner of the card, and we know something's exists
